segments.text: What do you think of this coffee table ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's nice , but it doesn't match the color of our room .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh no , this type gets dirty very easily and it's difficult to clean .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Alright , let's look at some others .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Look , this one matches our room and it's inexpensive .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Moreover , it's easy to clean , right ? You are really lazy .
segments.speaker: S1
